message: Found null safety errors in use_case_factory.dart - LoyaltyPointsModel has nullable fields (pointsBalance and lifetimeEarned) being passed to constructors expecting non-nullable ints

data.issue: pointsBalance and lifetimeEarned are int? but being passed as int

message: Successfully fixed all 4 null safety errors for pointsBalance and lifetimeEarned fields by adding null coalescing operator ?? 0

data.fix_applied: Added ?? 0 to all nullable int fields
data.errors_after: 0 null safety errors for these fields
